company: The Hong Kong Institution of Engineers
job_title: Programme Planning & Special Duties Officer (5-Day Work)
description:
Duties:

To provide necessary coordination and assistance to the organisation of seminars/webinars, events, learned society activities and programmes, and ad-hoc projects
To assist in conducting studies/researches for specific topic(s), and collate appropriate information to facilitate the Section in executing all its tasks and activities
To provide secretarial support to meetings and ad-hoc committees
To assist in the co-ordination of matters relating to membership benefits, school and publication education programmes, etc.
To provide documentary support in handling enquiries and complaints

Requirements:

University Graduate, preferably with 1-2 years work experience
Experience in handlung complaints is an added advantage
Excellent command of written and spoken English and Chinese
Attention to details
Strong PC skills in MC Word, Excel and Chinese word processing
Possess experience and knowledge of event and online seminar execution will be an advantage

Please apply in confidence with full career details and salary expectation to the Chief Executive and Secretary, The Hong Kong Institution of Engineers, 9/F Island Beverley, No 1 Great George Street, Causeway Bay, Hong Kong, or click “Apply Now” to submit your application. Applicants should indicate clearly on the envelope and in the letter for the post they are applying.

All information provided by applicants will be treated in strict confidence and used only for recruitment purpose.  Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.  All personal data of unsuccessful applicants will be destroyed after completion of the recruitment exercise.
selling_points: Assist in conducting seminars/webinars and events
